response.answer_text: Your vibration or level of consciousness is a combination of your thoughts, feelings, beliefs and actions and determines the types of experiences that you will attract in to your life through the law of attraction.Everything that happens in your life is a reflection of your vibration. For example, if you see the world from the consciousness of love, you will see love reflected back to you, if you see the world from a place of anger, you may attract confrontation or people may get angry easily around you. By raising your vibration the old patterns will start to drop out of your life so that you can create something better. Here are some ways to raise your vibration: CHANGE YOUR ENVIRONMENT Sometimes the environment and the people that you are around could be keeping you trapped in a lower vibration. If you spend a lot of time around certain people you will start to resonate with their energy and become more like them.Stay away from anyone who is constantly negative or draining or anyone who may see you in a certain way which triggers certain negative behaviours in you.Also sometimes wearing clothes that you wore when you were going through a bad situation can take you right back to that time or living in the same house could be holding you back by triggering certain memories or keeping you trapped in certain energy patterns.Keeping high vibrational crystals in your home can also be a great way of raising the energy in your environment. READ INSPIRATIONAL BOOKS Reading high vibrational books can help you to pick up on the vibration of the person who wrote it and even make you think like them. This means that it can be helpful to read the books of people who you want to be more like or have the type of life that you would like to create. Read More: 5 Ways To Raise Your Vibration | Spiral Crystals UK

Raising your vibration can be defined as increasing the innate energy your mind and body give out into the world. A persons vibration is determined by the thoughts they hold within themselves, the ideas they project into the world, and the physical actions they perform. To raise your vibration, you have to focus innately on certain objectives, and continuously apply yourself towards them. When a person is continuously jumping back and forth between their motives, their vibration decreases and become incoherent. Just as two speakers playing different music next to each other would become a garbled mess, so too does the energy of a person who isn't delivering a clear message to the universe. A person who realizes their true potential always aims for greatness and avoids the trap of being average. Subpar actions and half-hearted motivation doesn't garner meaningful advancement in life. There must be deliberate choices to uncover and utilize the limitless abilities uniquely wielded by you, and only you. Most importantly, you must identify what it is you desire most, then always ensure your thoughts and actions are conducive towards those goals. Establish an identity for yourself, and strive to become a force of positive change on the people around you. Ultimately, elevating your vibration is a gradual process, where every decision made either adds to it or depletes it. Every moment is an opportunity to perform at your peak and build towards that which you desire most.

Just as the number of petals on the symbolic lotuses of the chakras increase as one works upward from sacrum to brain (except the Ajna which is an extension of the Sahasrara), this symbolism expresses your notion of higher vibration - less indulgence in sensate bodily pleasures and increasingly more subtle fulfillments from compassion and wisdom. Instead of disappearing into the Absolute, one receives “vibration” from ‘on high’ which energizes one sufficiently to remain in the world but repel socially-conditioned worldly values that merely aggrandize the ego and draw one into the densities of materialism, moral relativism, and perhaps nihilism. This is a lonely way to be btw so if one is ill-prepared to be shunned by the majority of people as one who lives as a philosopher or a mystic above the “low games” of the multitudes, this is not a path to begin in the first place. A simple exercise to raise your vibration, is to sit by yourself when you wake up or when your going to sleep or during the day whenever you have time, and just observe your thoughts. Just sit there and watch your thoughts. Don’t try to control them dont try to resist them dont try to fight them just observe them without being judgmental to them, simply sit there and observe. You will start to learnt he nature of your thoughts and where they go habitually and more importantly you will start to learn that you are not your thoughts. You dont have to react to all the thoughts that come your way. You can watch a thought pass by and not react to it at all. This will raise your vibration instantly because your no longer reacting your observing and then letting go of the thoughts which makes you a more powerful human being. 90 percent of human beings dont do this. They could but they dont. This simple act will raise your vibration if dont consistently.

The answer to your question is covered in Kwame Iwegbue’s answer: You can know your frequency is good if you feel good. Your emotions are the key to guiding your thoughts. If you find something you are thinking about makes you unhappy, change the thought ASAP. If you find yourself in a situation where you are required to think about very negative things (making funeral arrangements for a loved one, for example), the best thing you can do is to try to remain detached when clear thinking is needed. Focus on the task. Allow yourself to grieve in the manner you choose, but do so knowing there is a limit. If you are looking for a way to get a boost during the day, then choose a memory or a future goal that makes you happy and just daydream for a bit. Live it in your mind ‘in the moment’, seeing and feeling everything you can that makes you happy. Maybe not while driving, but if you have an appropriate 5 minutes that need to be filled, like waiting in line at the grocery, it’s a good idea to give yourself a deliberate mood-boost. Or you can look at your watch and wish the line was moving faster. Your call. Choose happy thoughts as often as you can. This will keep your vibrations high.
